channel.title: [637] Anarchy2011 - Highscores | Vote4Reward | Good Economy | Double EXP|24/7VPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/static/toplist/220320.gif[/img][/CENTER] Anarchy2011 is the sequal to the late Anarchy07. As you may have guessed and for those that played Anarchy07 they take on a similar form. The difference is that Anarchy2011 is based on the 2011 era of RuneScape. We're a very economically based almost-remake like private server. Experience rates are rewarding, most content is almost exactly the same as RuneScape; we've just made it easier for you to access it!
We also have a fully working auto-vote system. Voting helps other people find our server and the reward is a present which when opened, gives you the option of tonnes of different items - you choose your own reward and it can be different every time you vote!
To put the icing on the cake, Anarchy2011 comes with 100% highscores, meaning that you can compete against your friends and the rest of the community to be the very best overall, or in any individual skill. Do you have what it takes?
[CENTER][SIZE=5][URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21858412/client.jar"]Download the client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.anarchy2011.info/"]Play on the webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.anarchy2011.co.uk/"]Visit the forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://anarchy2011.info/highscores/index.php"]View the highscores[/URL] [URL=http://"http://reddit.com/r/anarchy2011"]Our subreddit[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[B][U]Features[/U][/B]
[ul][*]100% Uptime [*]Friendly, informative staff. [*]Tormented Demons [*]Ice Strykewyrms [*]Frost Dragons [*]Custom Dungeoneering w/ rewards [*]Many fully working bosses! [*]Curses [*]Choatics & Ancient Warrior gear [*]Sounds [*]Music [*]Perfected skills [*]Strong economy [*]Rewarding experience gains [*]Vote4Reward [*]NPC and player clipping [*]Fully working highscores! [*]Warriors Guild [*]Chinchompa Hunting [*]Farming [*]Webclient and jar client [*]Fully working specials including D Claws and Korasi Sword [*]Perfect PvP Combat [*]So so much more![/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Mf3DbrL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/th2mjh0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5ba32jd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5BpXVh2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sNmyxMk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kjl8xug.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/83vajEM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/W0wkX9q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KoYZUGm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aDJPwAb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Bql0rI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NpcI0Ao.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Oey2QdK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lIc7qxd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pbb7B5q.png[/img]
